author: Staff Reporter
text:
The wholesale price of egg was reduced by 18 paise to be fixed at Rs. 3.15 here on Thursday.

Officials of the National Egg Coordination Committee (NECC), Namakkal Zone, said that due to drop in demand, the wholesale price of egg is on the downward trend.

On March 1, the price of egg was Rs. 3.20 and increased to Rs. 3.33 on March 7, they said.

However, it dropped to Rs. 3.15 on Thursday.

They said that the average price of egg in March was Rs. 3.27 when compared to Rs. 2.55 during the corresponding month last year.

Officials added that the wholesale price of egg in other centres also dropped including Ahmedabad Rs. 3.20, Nagpur Rs. 3.20, Pune Rs. 3.10 and Barwala Rs. 2.80. With consumption expected to be low, the price of eggs is expected to fall till May and recover in June.
title: Wholesale price of egg reduced by 18 paise
